forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of around one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow. Mostly cloudy. High near 38, with temperatures falling to around 29 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of around one inch possible.

forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before 7pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 16. Northwest wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 28, with temperatures falling to around 26 in the afternoon. West wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday Night

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy blowing snow and patchy freezing drizzle and scattered snow showers. Mostly cloudy. High near 26, with temperatures falling to around 19 in the afternoon. Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: From the park website: Bucks Run is currently closed.  Snow is currently being made for Bucks Run and construction will being in the coming weeks. The golf course trails, Coyote Run and Hawk Hills, along with Cedar Trace were rolled December 9, 2025.  No additional grooming has taken place.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Please access the XC trails from Valley road during snowmaking. The upper trails are groomed and in great shape.
nubsNob.comments: Nub's Nob is closed today so that we can concentrate on snowmaking. We will be open daily beginning Friday, December 12. The Snow Crew is making exceptional progress and we plan to have all of the frontside and southside runs open this Friday which will bring our run count to over 30 runs. Pintail Peak will open by the following weekend. Thanks for skiing at Nub's Nob.
